name: CATcher (itch)
description:
Help the cats get from point A to point B!

Use your keyboard or mouse to move the paddle. Use your paddle to move the cats. Press F to toggle fullscreen, and P to paws.

Note: This game is in early access. I have a whole bunch of other stuff planned for it in the future, such as:

  • More powerups!
  • More music!
  • More cat colors!
  • More cats!
  • An actual title screen!
